    • Uses of IComponent in components

      Classes in components that implement IComponent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CCommandInput
      The component CCommandInput holds a command and its arguments.
      class  CCommandQueue
      The component CCommandList contains a list of Command which are used by the Broker System (Command Pattern)
      class  CCommandSchemes
      The component CCommandSchemes contains some or all of the commands handled.
      class  CComputerLevel
      A computer level component.
      class  CDescription
      A simple component holding a description.
      class  CExit
      An Exit component.
      class  CInPlayer
      An input dialog component.
      class  CInventory
      An Inventory component.
      class  CMaxWeight
      This component defines the maximum weight an entity can carry
      class  CName
      A name component
      class  COutDialog
      A component carrying a text to write on the output stream.
      class  CPositionString
      A position component carrying a string of the "position".
      class  CWeight
      A weight component
